post.body: it's cuz the band is gone due to winter break.
i'm totally wearing my xtratuf's today.
good job teaching nick media that fast. And nick good job learning that fast.
I'm at the game too and i agree. Storm looks like a tool.
The lady at the bank recognized the 'alaskan amber' beer that's on my sweatshirt. it makes me happy.
tired.
After being in the Seattle airport for 8 hours. i missed my connection to kansas city and now have to wait until 9 to leave. I left June ...
Boo 5 hour lay over's in seattle.
I really don't want to go back to kansas. I hope my flights are cancelled due to weather and i get stuck in Juneau for a few more days.
I hiked out to the glacier, but in the snow this time and saw a wolf too!
ugh i hate shopping and i've been running errands / shopping for 4 hours! She's so slow and indecisive! But i love her.
I'm bummed that . Missing the christmas eve service at ucc.
I forgot how incredibly expensive everything in Juneau is!
I just woke up to lots of falling snow! Beautiful!
I keep feeling like it's a lot later in the day then it is cuz the sun is going down and it's only 1:15!
Bad thing about juneau: 1 road w/ a speed limit of 55 mph.
It's 10:45 am and the sun is just now rising up from behind the mountians.
I'm late responding to things cuz w/ the time change i'm 3 hours behind you now.
I finally made it to juneau after over 24 hours of travel! It's so nice to be home!
I feel like an impatient little kid. I'm getting squirmy after sitting on the plane so long. So far it's not looking like we'll make it ...
